UniprotID	Q9BZ23-3
Accession	Q9BZ23;B1AK33;B2Z3X0;D3DVZ0;Q5T7I2;Q5T7I4;Q7RTX5;Q8N7Q4;Q8TCR5;Q9BYW5;Q9HAF2
EntryName	PANK2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Pantothenate kinase 2, mitochondrial (hPanK2) (EC 2.7.1.33) (Pantothenic acid kinase 2) [Cleaved into: Pantothenate kinase 2, mitochondrial intermediate form (iPanK2); Pantothenate kinase 2, mitochondrial mature form (mPanK2)]
GeneName	PANK2 C20orf48
Length	447
Function	Mitochondrial isoform that catalyzes the phosphorylation of pantothenate to generate 4'-phosphopantothenate in the first and rate-determining step of coenzyme A (CoA) synthesis (PubMed:15659606, PubMed:16272150, PubMed:17242360, PubMed:17825826). Required for angiogenic activity of umbilical vein of endothelial cells (HUVEC) (PubMed:30221726).
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion; Mitochondrion intermembrane space; Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm
Disorder
